Control Name: Objectively Evaluates—Separate evaluations are performed periodically to provide objective feedback.

control_attributes.Control: Objectively Evaluates—Separate evaluations are performed periodically to provide objective feedback.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC4.1 COSO Principle 16: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning.
